text:
Hey, guys.
I am trying to get the certification of HubSpot developer and I am trying to build the page just like the practise.
But I have a problem with using Drag and Drop Modules.
My account is free account and seems like I need to upgrade my account to Professional or Enterprise.
I am not sure for them.
Are there any alternative ways for using DnD or do I must upgrading?
Thank you.
